SongLyrics.JpnStr: いつだってワガママばっかで 子供[こども]みたいね
SongLyrics.EngStr: You're always so selfish, like a child.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]だってないものねだり 何[なに]が欲[ほ]しいの?教[おし]えて
SongLyrics.EngStr: You're also asking for something you don't have. What do you want? Tell me.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: あっち見[み]たりそっちを見[み]たり 美人[びじん]が好[す]きなのね
SongLyrics.EngStr: Looking here and there, you like pretty women, don't you?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]だってさっきのカフェの 店員[てんいん]さんがタイプでしょ?答[こた]えて
SongLyrics.EngStr: You also liked that waitress at the café earlier, didn't you? Answer me.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ゆらゆらゆらゆら僕[ぼく]の心[こころ]、風[かぜ]に吹[ふ]かれて
SongLyrics.EngStr: My heart is swaying, blown by the wind.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ゆらゆらゆらゆら君[きみ]の心[こころ]、はなればなれ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Your heart is swaying, drifting apart.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ゆらゆらゆらゆら二人[ふたり]の恋[こい]は宙[ちゅう]に舞[ま]っていく
SongLyrics.EngStr: Our love is swaying and floating in the air.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ゆらゆらゆらゆら綿毛[わたげ]みたいに揺[ゆ]れてる
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's swaying like a dandelion fluff.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: さっきから聞[き]いてないでしょ 私[わたし]の話[はなし]。
SongLyrics.EngStr: You haven't been listening to me for a while, have you?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ねぇねぇ、聞[き]いてよ そこのドーナツ屋[や]来週[らいしゅう]オープンだって
SongLyrics.EngStr: Hey, hey, listen! That donut shop is opening next week.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: あーあ、2人[ふたり]で行[い]こうと思[おも]ってたのに
SongLyrics.EngStr: Ahh, I was planning for us to go together...

SongLyrics.JpnStr: あーあ、連[つ]れてってやろうと思[おも]ってたのになぁ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Ahh, I was going to take you there, too...

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ゆらゆらゆらゆら僕[ぼく]の心[こころ]、雨[あめ]に降[ふ]られて
SongLyrics.EngStr: My heart is swaying, drenched by the rain.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ゆらゆらゆらゆら君[きみ]の心[こころ]、はなればなれ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Your heart is swaying, drifting apart.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ゆらゆらゆらゆら二人[ふたり]の恋[こい]は宙[ちゅう]に舞[ま]っていく
SongLyrics.EngStr: Our love is swaying and floating in the air.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ゆらゆらゆらゆらタバコみたいに燃[も]えてく
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's swaying and burning like a cigarette.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ゆらゆらゆらゆら僕[ぼく]の心[こころ]、過去[かこ]に囚[とら]われ
SongLyrics.EngStr: My heart is swaying, trapped in the past.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ゆらゆらゆらゆら君[きみ]の心[こころ]、未来[みらい]に消[き]えて
SongLyrics.EngStr: Your heart is swaying, disappearing into the future.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ゆらゆらゆらゆら僕[ぼく]の心[こころ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: My heart is swaying.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ゆらゆらゆらゆら君[きみ]の心[こころ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Your heart is swaying.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ゆらゆらゆらゆら僕[ぼく]の心[こころ]、風[かぜ]に吹[ふ]かれて
SongLyrics.EngStr: My heart is swaying, blown by the wind.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ゆらゆらゆらゆら君[きみ]の心[こころ]、高[たか]く舞[ま]って
SongLyrics.EngStr: Your heart is swaying, soaring high.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ゆらゆらゆらゆら僕[ぼく]の心[こころ]と
SongLyrics.EngStr: My heart swaying.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ゆらゆらゆらゆら君[きみ]の心[こころ]と
SongLyrics.EngStr: Your heart swaying.
